summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5705 for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Webster Street to West Myrtle Street on the west; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75438 as amended by Ordinance No. 75559, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
